name: Alice (Nik)
description:
What really are dreams?⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯Nik, the protagonist has always been a lucid dreamer.However since he was young, Alice would always show up in his dreams.She seems to be in full control of his dreams, and knows exactly when he's about to wake up.Until one day, He wakes up only to find himself crying...Am i... crying?Her name...What was it?Who really is Alice? Why is she always showing up in his dreams?⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯Alice is a Slice of Life, Romance Visual Novel Game!
The game has 3 Endings, but only in one of them you get to find out who really Alice is.And don't forget...Every single decision you make is going to affect the future!⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯This is my first ever Visual Novel, I'm sure you're going to love the story and hopefully you'll find it entertaining!
Let me know what you think in the comments below!
